ygData.subject: Re: Documentation on Blacksmith
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you ll repost it as text or html, I ll read it. Otherwise, I have a policy of not opening attachments in mail I receive.  Sorry. Perhaps you can email
ygData.messageBody:
--- Gerald Koenig <g.koenig@...> wrote:
> I try to compile a Documentation on Blacksmith
> so if you find any error or add something tell me

If you'll repost it as text or html, I'll read it.
Otherwise, I have a policy of not opening attachments
in mail I receive. Sorry.

Perhaps you can email it directly to me? But
honestly, if it's only a few pages or so, just post it
as text to the list.

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
